# streaming with bayer

Streams from usb to tcp socket.

```
+ echo -e '\x04'
+ sleep 5
+ socat - tcp:localhost:23200
1H|\^&||RDqTV1|Bayer7390^01.26\01.05\02.06.20^7390-2902076^7393A|A=1^C=02^G=0^I=0200^R=0^S=1^U=0^V=20600^X=070070070070180130180250^Y=360126090050099050300089^Z=1|0|||||P|1|2013060116038E
1H|\^&||JMR6JM|Bayer7390^01.26\01.05\02.06.20^7390-2902076^7393A|A=1^C=02^G=0^I=0200^R=0^S=1^U=0^V=20600^X=070070070070180130180250^Y=360126090050099050300089^Z=1|0|||||P|1|2013060116038E
```

```
+ echo
+ socat - tcp:localhost:23200
+ echo -e '\x06'
+ sleep 5
1H|\^&||BIJ6BE|Bayer7390^01.26\01.05\02.06.20^7390-2902076^7393A|A=1^C=02^G=0^I=0200^R=0^S=1^U=0^V=20600^X=070070070070180130180250^Y=360126090050099050300089^Z=1|0|||||P|1|2013060116036A
+ echo
```
